#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ll long long int
#define s(x) scanf("%d", &x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld", &x)
#define mod 1000000007

int convert(int x, int n, int m)
{
    if (x <= n)
        return x;
    x -= (m-1);
    x %= (n-m+1);
    if (!x)
        return n;
    return x+m-1;
}

int main()
{
    int t, n, m, s, p, q, x, y, cnt, i;
    s(t);
    while (t--) {
        s(n);
        s(m);
        s(s);
        s(p);
        s(q);
        cnt = x = y = 0;
        for (i = 0; i < s; ++i) {
            x += p;
            y += q;
            x = convert(x, n, m);
            y = convert(y, n, m);
            cnt += (x == y);
        }
        printf("%d\n", cnt);
    }
    return 0;
}
